thread.title: American Appraisal Canada Celebrates Pan Am Games 2015 with Infographic
thread.title_full: American Appraisal Canada Celebrates Pan Am Games 2015 with Infographic

title: American Appraisal Canada Celebrates Pan Am Games 2015 with Infographic
text:
July 10, 2015 14:28 ET American Appraisal Canada Celebrates Pan Am Games 2015 with Infographic 
TORONTO, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - July 10, 2015) - 
Editors Note: There is an image associated with this press release. 
American Appraisal Canada, a valuation and fixed asset management advisor and a division of Duff & Phelps, has released an infographic about the upcoming 2015 Pan Am / Parapan Am Games. 
On July 10 th , 2015 the opening ceremonies will take place for the 17 th edition of the Games. To get things rolling, American Appraisal Canada's new infographic presents fun facts and statistics related to the games and what they've meant for the country. This will be the third time that the Games have been hosted by Canada. The first two times, in 1967 and 1999, they were held in Winnipeg. This time, they are hosted by 15 municipalities in Ontario. 
The infographic sheds light on the number of people involved in the Games, including athletes, coaches, team officials, volunteer workers and employees, and outlines the venues in which they will take place. It also highlights some of the most significant investments in venues and other aspects of making the events successful. Fun facts are presented about other implications of the Games, such as the total length and locations of HOV lanes that were created, how much wood was used for the cycling track and how many dump trucks of sand it took to make the volleyball stadium. 
"This infographic is a great way to get into the spirit of the 2015 Pan Am / Parapan Am Games." says Herb Saunders, National Managing Director of American Appraisal Canada; "Canada is expected to field the most athletes and the entire country will have a reason to celebrate once the gold medals start pouring in." 
About American Appraisal 
American Appraisal, a division of Duff and Phelps Corporation, is a leading valuation and related advisory services firm that provides expertise in all classifications of tangible and intangible assets. For more information, visit http://www.american-appraisal.ca . Duff & Phelps is the premier global valuation and corporate finance advisor with expertise in complex valuation, dispute consulting, M&A, restructuring, and governance and regulatory consulting. The firm's more than 1,500 employees serve a diverse range of clients from offices around the world. For more information, visit www.duffandphelps.com . 
To view the infographic associated with this release, please visit the following link: http://media3.marketwire.com/docs/PanAm-Infographic.jpg . Contact Information
